data.name: JAMAL ET MEHDI: The Quest for the iencli
data.detailed_description: Barely out of depression, Herve Liencli decides to celebrate his birthday to get better. The only problem is that he doesn't have many friends. He then decides to invite Jamal and Mehdi for a fee. However, in the first moments of the party, Higher Corp agents broke into Hervé Liencli's house to kidnap Jamal and Mehdi. Ready to do anything to save his friends, Hervé put his fears aside to save them. Thus, your adventure will take place in the city of Hell City. You will need to solve puzzles and fight turn-based in order to reach your goal!
data.about_the_game: Barely out of depression, Herve Liencli decides to celebrate his birthday to get better. The only problem is that he doesn't have many friends. He then decides to invite Jamal and Mehdi for a fee. However, in the first moments of the party, Higher Corp agents broke into Hervé Liencli's house to kidnap Jamal and Mehdi. Ready to do anything to save his friends, Hervé put his fears aside to save them. Thus, your adventure will take place in the city of Hell City. You will need to solve puzzles and fight turn-based in order to reach your goal!
data.short_description: Jamal and Mehdi: the quest for the iencli, is a turn-based Urban RPG. Thus, your adventure will take place in the city of Hell City. You will need to solve puzzles and fight turn-based in order to reach your goal!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4400 or more, Radeon HD graphics 5430 or more, OpenGL 3.0 or more
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.

movies.name: JAMAL ET MEHDI: La Quête du Iencli

content_descriptors.notes: JAMAL AND MEHDI: the quest for iencli, contains vulgar and offensive dialogues at times.
